text: Pherecydes of Leros () was an ancient Greek historian from the Aegean island of Leros. He lived during the 5th century BCE and wrote three texts: "On Leros" (Περὶ Λέρου), "On Iphigenia" (Περὶ Ἰφιγενείας), and "On the Festivals of Dionysus" (Περὶ τῶν Διονύσου ἑορτῶν).; Suda Φ 217. Pherecydes of Leros is maybe the same person as Pherecydes of Athens even though the Suda treats them as separate individuals.; Suda Φ 216. ==References== ===Citations=== ===Sources=== * * Category:Ancient Greeks Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown
title: Pherecydes of Leros
